original: Bengtsson, Olof Samuel (Sam), rektor, Brålanda (Färgelanda), f. 22/ 10/85 i By, Värml. k, av Jan Gustaf B. o. Emma Tempelman. G. 1. 16 m. Maja Gustafsson, d. 38; 2. 42 m. Dagny Arne. Barn: Inga f. 18, Carin 20, Britta 21. — Realex. 08, agron:ex. v. Ultuna 12. E. lär. v. Hampnäs lant-m:sk. i Själevad 12-16, ord. lär. v. V. Värml. folkhögsk. i Arvika 16-18, jordbr:förv. o. e. lär. v. Sigtunastift. 18-22, förest, v. Dailsknds lanth:sk. i Färge’1’anida 23, rektor v. Nuntorps lantm:’sk. i Brålanda 40. Ordf. i Färgelanda hälsov:nd’ 35-42, egnah:omb. 30-42, Tev. i komm. 28-35. RVO 41.
translated: Bengtsson, Olof Samuel (Sam), principal, Brålanda (Färgelanda), b. 22/10/85 in By, Värmland, son of Jan Gustaf B. and Emma Tempelman. Married 1st, 16 years to Maja Gustafsson, who died in 1938; 2nd, 42 years to Dagny Arne. Children: Inga b. 1918, Carin 1920, Britta 1921. Completed high school in 1908, agricultural science degree from Ultuna in 1912. Became a teacher at Hampnäs agricultural school in Själevad from 1912-1916, a regular teacher at Västra Värmland folk high school in Arvika from 1916-1918, an agricultural adviser and educational teacher at Sigtuna Foundation in 1918-1922. Also served as headmaster at Dalskland's rural school in Färgelanda in 1923, and as principal at Nuntorps agricultural school in Brålanda from 1940. He was chairman of the Färgelanda health committee from 1935-1942, and agricultural commissioner from 1930-1942. He was also a member of the municipal council from 1928-1935 and was awarded the Royal Order of Vasa in 1941.
